root: ^Do you mind if I ask you something personal?

Choice1: ^I'll admit it's a bit weird to think that there's something else out there.
^But at this point I've just accepted that there's room in the world for things that don't make sense.
^Weird things happen all the time, right? Things we can't always explain.
^Sometimes it's comforting to think about life after death.
^It is nice. And maybe something that supernatural can make the weird parts of life make more sense.
Choice2: ^I can't say I know what happens after death. It's nice to think that those who die still exist in some way.
^But I think that if we make an effort to remember those people and all they left behind, they still exist, you know? They exist through our minds.
^I just don't like to think that those people are just gone.
^No one goes away forever. Someone will remember them, or something they did. SOme part of them will be left behind.
